A list of mathematical terms I have come across and needed to look up.
## Table of Contents
* TOC
{:toc}

## Setup
---
Consider a mechanical system whose dynamics are given by a second order differential equation. Let $M$ represent the configuration manifold, and $TM$ represent the tangent bundle (manifold), i.e. the space of all positions of velocities. Additionally, let $T$ represent the total kinetic energy of the system, and $V$ represent the potential energy.

## Lagrangian Dynamics
---
The Lagrangian of a system is a quadratic form $L:TM\to\mathbb{R}$ given by 
\\[L=T-V.\\]

## Hamiltonian Dynamics
The Hamiltonian of a system is a quadratic form $H:T^*M\to\mathbb{R}$ given by
\\[H=T+V.\\]
---
